DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter study assess health well-being subject outpatient major depressive disorder take desvenlafaxine succinate sustain release ( DVS SR ) placebo 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Desvenlafaxine Succinate Sustained Release In Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Outpatient men woman , age 18 75 year , fluent write spoken English . Employed 20 hour minimum 1 month prior baseline . Primary diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder symptoms least 30 day prior baseline . Treatment desvenlafaxine succinate sustain release time past and/or venlafaxine ( Effexor Effexor XR ) 1 year prior baseline . Treatmentresistant define follow fail treatment past 3 year : 3 previous adequate trial > =2 class antidepressant medication , electroconvulsive therapy , psychotherapy ( 2 adequate trial ) . Current ( within 12 month prior screen visit ) psychoactive substance abuse dependence ( include alcohol ) , manic episode , posttraumatic stress disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder , lifetime diagnosis bipolar psychotic disorder . Clinically important abnormality physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , laboratory evaluation .
